text: Nakul Abhyankar (born 25 May 1990) is an Indian playback singer and music composer. He has sung in Tamil, Kannada, Telugu, Malayalam , Tulu. He is best known for his songs "Thumbi Thullal" from the film "Cobra" Composed by Dr. A.R.Rahman, "malai kuruvi", a solo from Tamil movie Chekka Chivantha Vaanam, "CEO in the House" from the Tamil film Sarkar and Azhage from Tamil movie Action. He has also composed music for feature films like Kannad Gothilla, Unarvu, Bicchugatthi and College Kumara [Tamil and Telugu]. His upcoming project as a composer is a web series called Humble Politiciann Nograj starring Danish Sait. == Biography == He is trained in both the Hindustani and Carnatic styles of classical music. He received training in jazz singing at KM Music Conservatory and was a part of A.R. Rahman's jazz band, Nafs. He graduated from National Institute of Technology Karnataka with a degree in Mechanical engineering in 2012. == Discography == === As a singer === {| class="wikitable" |- !Year !Song Title !Film/Soundtrack/Album !Composer !Language !Co-singer(s) !Notes |- | rowspan="4" |2020 |Thumbi Thullal |Cobra |A.R.
